p: Exclusion criteria were based on standard prescribing information for boceprevir and telaprevir.[ 15, 16] These included: co-infection with Hepatitis B Virus (HBV) or Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV), severe unstable neuropsychiatric disorders as determined by psychological evaluation, nursing or pregnant women, patients with a malignancy diagnosed and/or treated within the past 3 years (except for localized squamous or basal cell cancers), and current alcoholism or drug addiction.
